00021 // provide testCase, name
00022 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareBasic) {
00023 
00024     // System sys;
00025     // set sampling rate to 1 for testing
00026     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00027 
00028 
00029     WaveSquare a(sys);
00030 
00031     ConstantPtr gen1(new Constant(sys));
00032     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 0.0);
00033 
00034     ConstantPtr gen2(new Constant(sys));
00035     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 1.0);
00036 
00037     ConstantPtr gen3(new Constant(sys));
00038     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 1.0);
00039 
00040     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, gen1);
00041     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, gen2);
00042 
00043     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen3,
00044                    aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00045 
00046     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0), 0);
00047     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.5), 1);
00048     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.55), 1);
00049 
00050 
00051     // gen 4, 5 seconds per cycle
00052     ConstantPtr gen4(new Constant(sys));
00053     gen4->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 5.0);
00054 
00055     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen4,
00056                    aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00057     // a.setSecondsPerCycle(5);// 5 seconds per cycle
00058 
00059     // this is now zero
00060     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.55), 0);
00061     // this is now more than half
00062     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(2.5), 1);
00063     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(4.99), 1);
00064     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(5.00), 0);
00065 
00066     a.printSample(20, 0);
00067 
00068 }

00072 // provide testCase, name
00073 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareParameterSetting) {
00074 
00075 
00076     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00077 
00078     WaveSquare a(sys);
00079 
00080     ConstantPtr gen1(new Constant(sys));
00081     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 0.0);
00082 
00083     ConstantPtr gen2(new Constant(sys));
00084     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 1.0);
00085 
00086     ConstantPtr gen3(new Constant(sys));
00087     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 5.0);
00088 
00089 
00090     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, gen1);
00091     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, gen2);
00092 
00093     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen3, aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00094     // test that we have set the right thing
00095     EXPECT_EQ(a.getContext(aw::pNameRate),
00096              aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00097 
00098     // change to a different context
00099     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen3, aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00100     // test that we have set the right thing
00101     EXPECT_EQ(a.getContext(aw::pNameRate),
00102              aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00103 }

00106 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareValidParameterContext) {
00107     // test getting the valid parameter context
00108 
00109     
00110     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00111     WaveSquare a(sys);
00112 
00113     EXPECT_EQ(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameMinimum,
00114         aw::pContextNameNone), true);
00115     EXPECT_EQ(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameMinimum,
00116         aw::pContextNameFrequency), false);
00117 
00118     // rate can be fq or period, not none or trigger
00119     EXPECT_EQ(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRate,
00120         aw::pContextNameFrequency), true);
00121     EXPECT_EQ(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRate,
00122         aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds), true);
00123     EXPECT_EQ(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRate,
00124         aw::pContextNameTrigger), false);
00125     EXPECT_EQ(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRate,
00126         aw::pContextNameNone), false);
00127 
00128     // if given none, an exception will be thrown
00129     ConstantPtr gen1(new Constant(sys));
00130     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 5.0);
00131 
00132     ASSERT_THROW(a.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen1,
00133         aw::pContextNameNone), std::invalid_argument);
00134 
00135     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen1, aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00136 
00137 
00138 }

00145 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareDefaults) {
00146 
00147     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00148 
00149     // defaults already configured
00150     WaveSquare gen1(sys);
00151 
00152     // check the actual parameters
00153 
00154     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameMinimum)->getValueAtSample(0),
00155              0);
00156 
00157     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameMaximum)->getValueAtSample(0),
00158              1);
00159     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(0),
00160              6);
00161 
00162     // default period is 6 seconds;4 should be in up cycle 
00163     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(0), 0);
00164     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(4), 1);
00165 
00166 
00167     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 220.0,
00168                     aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00169 
00170     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(0),
00171              220);
00172 
00173     // set to an int
00174     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 5,
00175                     aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00176     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(0),
00177              5);
00178 }

00181 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareFrequencyParameter) {
00182 
00183     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00184 
00185     WaveSquare gen1(sys);
00186     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, -2);
00187     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 8);
00188     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameDutyCycle, .5);
00189 
00190     ConstantPtr gen2(new Constant(sys));
00191     // oscillates at a rate of 4
00192     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 0.25);
00193     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getValueAtSecond(0), .25);
00194 
00195     // the default frequency is 6
00196     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(0),
00197              6);
00198     // set a new frequency
00199     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 0.25, aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00200     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(0),
00201              .25);
00202     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(6),
00203              .25);
00204 
00205 
00206     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(0), -2);
00207     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(1), -2);
00208     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(2), 8);
00209     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(3), 8);
00210     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(4), -2);
00211     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSecond(5), -2);
00212 
00213     gen1.printSample(20, 0);
00214 
00215     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(0),
00216              .25);
00217 
00218 
00219     WaveSquare c(sys);
00220     c.setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, -8);
00221     c.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 2);
00222 
00223     ConstantPtr gen6(new Constant(sys));
00224     // oscillates at a rate of 5
00225     gen6->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, .2);
00226     EXPECT_EQ(gen6->getValueAtSecond(0), .2);
00227 
00228     c.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, gen6,
00229                    aw::pContextNameFrequency);
00230 
00231     EXPECT_EQ(c.getParameter(aw::pNameRate)->getValueAtSample(0),
00232              .2);
00233 
00234     EXPECT_EQ(c.getValueAtSecond(0), -8);
00235     EXPECT_EQ(c.getValueAtSecond(1), -8);
00236     EXPECT_EQ(c.getValueAtSecond(2), 2);
00237     EXPECT_EQ(c.getValueAtSecond(3), 2);
00238     EXPECT_EQ(c.getValueAtSecond(4), 2);
00239     EXPECT_EQ(c.getValueAtSecond(5), -8);
00240 
00241     c.printSample(20, 0);
00242 
00243 }

00247 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquarePeriodInSamples) {
00248 
00249     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00250 
00251     WaveSquare gen1(sys);
00252     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, 4, aw::pContextNamePeriodSamples);
00253     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSample(0), 0);
00254     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSample(1), 0);
00255     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSample(2), 1);
00256     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getValueAtSample(3), 1);
00257 }

00261 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareValidParameters) {
00262 
00263     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00264     WaveSquare gen1(sys);
00265 
00266     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameMaximum), true);
00267     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameMinimum), true);
00268     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameRefresh), false);
00269     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameRate), true);
00270     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameDutyCycle), true);
00271 
00272     // a bad argument for this generator will throw an exception
00273     ASSERT_THROW(gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, .4,
00274         aw::pContextNamePeriodSamples), std::invalid_argument);
00275     
00276 }
